original: 河東聞喜人，曹魏將領，毌丘儉之父。曾任武威太守，庸、涼邊疆諸胡時有叛亂，毌丘興以懷柔手段，使諸胡歸附，後又平定黃華、張進之亂。
text: Hedong Wen is gratifying, general Cao Wei, father of Wu Qiujian. Served as the prefect of Wuwei, the Hus in the border areas of Yong and Liang had rebellions. Wu Qiu Xing used gentle means to bring the Hus back to him, and then put down the rebellion of Huang Hua and Zhang Jin.
